
<!-- Generated by doc-generator on 2025-12-11 -->

---

## Props

### Content
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| caption | string | null | No | The text displayed on the button. If not provided, the button will render without text content. |
| badgevalue | string | null | No | Text content for a badge indicator that appears on the button, typically used for notifications or counters. |
| hint | string | undefined | No | Additional text that provides contextual information about the button's purpose or action. |

### Icon Configuration
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| iconclass | string | null | No | CSS class name for the icon, typically used with icon font libraries like FontAwesome or Material Icons. |
| iconurl | string | null | No | URL or path to an image file to be used as the button icon. Alternative to iconclass for custom images. |
| iconposition | any | 'left' | No | Position of the icon relative to the button text. Accepts 'left', 'right', 'top', or 'bottom'. |
| iconsize | number | 0 | No | Size of the icon in pixels. When set to 0, uses the default icon size from styling. |
| iconheight | number | null | No | Specific height for the icon in pixels. Overrides iconsize for height dimension. |
| iconwidth | number | null | No | Specific width for the icon in pixels. Overrides iconsize for width dimension. |
| iconmargin | number | null | No | Margin spacing around the icon in pixels to control distance from text or button edges. |

### Interaction
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| onTap | Function | null | No | Callback function executed when the button is tapped or clicked. Receives event object as parameter. |

### Animation
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| animation | string | null | No | Animation type to apply when the button appears or state changes. Accepts predefined animation names. |
| animationdelay | number | null | No | Delay in milliseconds before the animation starts executing. |

### Loading States
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| skeletonheight | string | null | No | Height of the skeleton placeholder shown during loading states. Accepts CSS length values. |
| skeletonwidth | string | null | No | Width of the skeleton placeholder shown during loading states. Accepts CSS length values. |

### Accessibility
| Prop | Type | Default | Required | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------|-------------|
| accessibilitylabel | string | undefined | No | Text description read by screen readers to identify the button's purpose for visually impaired users. |
| accessibilityrole | AccessibilityRole | "button" | No | Semantic role for accessibility tools. Default "button" role is appropriate for most use cases. |

### Inherited Props
| Prop | Type | Default | Inherited From | Description |
|------|------|---------|----------------|-------------|
| id | string | null | BaseProps | Unique identifier for the component instance. |
| name | string | null | BaseProps | Name attribute for the component, useful for form handling or component identification. |
| disabled | any | false | BaseProps | Disables the button interaction and applies disabled styling when true. |
| show | any | true | BaseProps | Controls component visibility. Accepts boolean, string, or number values. |
| styles | any | null | BaseProps | Custom inline styles object to override default component styling. |
| classname | string | null | BaseProps | Additional CSS class names to apply to the component root element. |
| showindevice | ('xs'\|'sm'\|'md'\|'lg'\|'xl'\|'xxl')[] | null | BaseProps | Array of screen size breakpoints where the component should be visible. |
| showskeleton | boolean | undefined | BaseProps | Shows skeleton placeholder instead of actual content during loading states. |
| disabletoucheffect | boolean | false | BaseProps | Disables visual feedback effects like ripples or highlights during touch interactions. |

## Events

| Event | Description | Parameters |
|-------|-------------|------------|
| onTap | Fired when the button is tapped or clicked | `e` - Event object containing interaction details |
| onTouchstart | Fired when touch interaction begins on the button | `e` - Touch event object with contact point information |
| onDoubletap | Fired when the button receives two rapid taps | `e` - Event object with timing and position data |
| onLongtap | Fired when the button is pressed and held for an extended period | `e` - Event object with duration and pressure information |
| onTouchend | Fired when touch interaction ends on the button | `e` - Touch event object with final contact information |

## Style Classes

### Button Variants
- `btn-primary` - Primary action button with brand color styling
- `btn-secondary` - Secondary action button with muted styling
- `btn-success` - Success state button with green color scheme
- `btn-info` - Informational button with blue color scheme
- `btn-warning` - Warning button with yellow/orange color scheme
- `btn-danger` - Destructive action button with red color scheme
- `btn-default` - Default button styling with neutral colors
- `btn-link` - Text-only button styled as a clickable link
- `btn-dark` - Dark themed button with dark background
- `btn-light` - Light themed button with light background

### Button States
- `app-button` - Default base styling for all button instances
- `app-button-disabled` - Styling applied when button is in disabled state
- `btn-only-label` - Styling for buttons containing only text without icons

### Floating Action Buttons
- `fab-btn` - Large circular floating action button styling
- `mini-fab-btn` - Smaller circular floating action button styling
